entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
